response.original_title: The Legend of the Imperial Physician
response.overview: The Wang family is proficient in traditional According to the doctrine of his familyâ€™s ancestor, Wang Zhaoen would rather live a normal life than serve in the palace. So he runs away from his hometown. However, he was still found by Emperor Qianlong and was hired as an imperial physician. Wang was highly praised for his unique skills in saving the dying and healing the wounded, his success made some others jealousy. They framed Wang and almost made him dead. After the death of Emperor Qianlong, he had no choice but to flee from the court and live among the people.
response.title: The Legend of the Imperial Physician
